data.text:
Cottage in Kumluca

4.94 out of 5 average rating, 95 reviews4.94 (95)

Cozy mountain view house with pool Olympos&Adrasan

For those who want to spend a peaceful vacation, just 10 mins away from Olympos & Adrasan, is this stunning mountain-view house with private pool! We've transformed this unique historical stone structure into a modern home. The upper floor has a living room and open kitchen, while the lower floor has a bedroom and bathroom. Perfect for a relaxing vacation with mountain views and surrounded by pomegranate & olive trees! You can reach the sea, market, and shopping areas within 10-15 mins by car.

Home in KonyaaltÄ±

4.83 out of 5 average rating, 116 reviews4.83 (116)

Villa Esiyok Antalya with heated pool

House is 327 m2 with heated swimming pool. 2 independent floors. Ideal for 2 families. 4 bedrooms, 2 livingrooms, 1 dining room, 1 common room. Space, cutlery and bedding for 15 adults, 2 children and 2 cradle. 2 tea kitchens and a large kitchen. 1 guest toilet, 2 bathrooms both with spa. Electric underfloor heating. Air conditioning. Fireplace. 15-20 minutes by car from the beach. 25 minutes to the big Migros Shopping mall. 35 km from airport. Overlooking the Mediterranean Sea and Antalya.
